          <title>
            <string language="en">Testing gas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Prüfengas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Gaz de test</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Gás testando</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gas difficile</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Να εξετάσει αέριο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Gas de prueba</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows a set up to test the gas that turn lime water from colourless to milky.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Carbon dioxide</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Gas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">lime water</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt einem Set bis zum Test das 
Gas, das Kalkwasser von farblosem zu milchigem drehen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre que une installation 
testait le gaz qui tournent l'eau de chaux de sans couleur à laiteux.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a um jogo até o teste o 
gás que gira a água de cal de incolor para leitoso.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra una messa a punto per 
verificare il gas che gira l'acqua di calce da incolore a latteo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει μια ίδρυση για να 
εξετάσει αέριο ότι ύδωρ ασβέστη στροφής από άχρωμο σε 
γαλακτώδη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra a conjunto hasta prueba
el gas que da vuelta al agua de cal de descolorido a lechoso.</string>
          </description>
